title: Salam App
brief: Salam App is your privacy-focused Islamic companion. This ad-free app is designed to assist Muslims in all aspects of their daily life, so you can fully dedicate yourself to your faith.

title: 99 Names Modules
brief: Introduction to Salam App's 99 names modules and instructions to use it.Leard about the names of Allah almihty.

title: Calendar
brief: Introduction to Salam App's calender modules and instructions to use it. Learn more about the important dates in islam and festivals.
